title: Android Developer
description: We’re seeking an experienced and passionate Android developer to join our mobile team in building the next generation of intuitive and beautiful applications for Android devices. In this role, you will have the opportunity to help shape and execute our technical strategy while leading a group of talented developers. You’ll work alongside our product and design teams to implement highly interactive and branded interfaces.
responsibilities:
• Design and develop Android applications using Agile methodologies
  • Work closely with design and web teams to create compelling and inspiring applications
lookingFor:
• 1+ years of professional programming experience
  • Advanced knowledge of Android development
  • Experience integrating mobile applications and server-side APIs
  • Experience with semantic HTML5, CSS, and Javascript in a mobile environment
  • Understanding of Test-driven Development (TDD)/Behavior-driven Development (BDD)
  • Experience with Native iOS development preferred
